entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the dev experience when a user doesn't apply an interactive render mode to a component that requires interactivity #57009
  • Bring back the old Blazor Templates #57008
  • Angular SPA application with SSR rendering #57004
  • Static file "static" configuration #57002
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #56998
  • New .Net 8.0 with Angular - Cannot Run In IIS Express even after adding Authentication Negotiate, etc #56996
  • Routes component is not found in assembly when render mode is set to InteractiveAuto #57007
  • [9.0-preview7] OpenAPI schemas are not stable between generations #56990
  • @microsoft/signalr update from 8.0.0 to 8.0.7 webpack_require issue - angular 16 with module federation #56989
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #56987
  • Negotiate H2C on a Kestrel endpoint that supports HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 #56984

Closed

  • Perf regression: json, json #56963
  • VS-CODE HTTP launch configuration trusted certificate required #56853
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi How to setup versioning in .net9 using Microsoft OpenApi with minimal-api #56994
  • Keyed services fail to dependency inject into middleware #54500
    9.0-rc1
  • Slowness on the Clint End | Memory spike in the Chrome browser #52557
  • SignalR OnDisconnect not called when client re-connects #53488
  • Cannot use AddJwtBearer with alternate scheme name #56834
  • IMemoryCache duplicating records(from enum key) in blazor wasm #56826
  • Blazor hybrid navigation failed #56838

PullRequests

Created

  • Make dev-certs import consistent with kestrel #57014
    area-networking
  • Main #57012
    area-commandlinetools
  • Update timeouts in quarantined-pr.yml #57011
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.IO.Redist dependency #57006
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Update Microsoft.IO.Redist dependency #57005
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `5bcb2d7` #57001
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `5bcb2d7` #57000
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9ff2450` to `5bcb2d7` #56999
    area-infrastructure
  • Add remarks to FromBodyAttrbiute #56997
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Allow ShowColumnOptionsAsync method to accept null parameter #56991
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Restrict permissions to the dev cert directory #56985
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Update Templates.Mvc.Tests.csproj #57010
    area-mvc, 9.0-rc1
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Go back to checked-in minified .js files #56995
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Update Microsoft.JSInterop.JS version to 9.0.0 #56983
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1
  • Go back to checked-in minified .js files #56982
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Fix typo in variable name: hasExplictValue -> hasExplicitValue #56981
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b4aaf97` to `9ff2450` #56894
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Navigation Exception: Introduce Clear Message #56644
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] [Infrastructure] Update jquery validate periodically #56881
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • Use Base64Url in WebEncoders #56959
    area-networking, 9.0.0
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56768
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
